text: 3|77|evarkal allahvitattil ceyta vakkurutiyaiyum, tankal cattiyankalaiyum corpavilaikku virruvitukirarkalo avarkalukku marumaiyil niccayamaka oru (nar)pakkiyamumillai. Melum, allah (marumaiyil) avarkalutan (virumpip) pecavumattan; (anputan) avarkalai iruti nalil tirumpipparkkavum mattan; avarkalaip punitappatuttavum mattan. Avarkalukkut tunpuruttum vetanaiyum untu
